name: Douglas
text:
Douglas
Officer Douglas was a police officer with the Buckhorn Police Department.
Biography
Douglas, along with his partner, Officer Olson, reported to a smell coming from the apartment of Ruth Davenport. Following a short search for the keys - due to neighbor Marjorie Green forgetting she had a set. The officers briefly searched the room before finding Ruth dead.
Douglas observed as Constance Talbot and Detective Dave Macklay came to investigate the scene.
